conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D extrusions and isometric perspective applied.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth, consistent wall thickness, and perfectly executed cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the original blueprint layout, room proportions, and wall placements.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D plan nearly perfectly; bathroom and kitchen fixtures are all present.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with soft shadows and clear structural distinction. Professional presentation.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of door swings in the 3D model relative to specific 2D arcs.

summary: This is a highly accurate and professional 3D transformation that preserves the exact geometry and interior logic of the provided floor plan.
